name: Tedram v2
description:
In this game you can drive a car or a 2 trucks and choose your profession, your free to do what you want, you can do some pizzas but in other way you can work to truck garbage driver and collect all the garbage in the city. If you dont like to collect the garbage you can collect suplies to the pizzeria.

If you see some error or bug or just want to give me some ideas to updates or you want to see something in the game just join the discord:

https://discord.gg/CjBzX4thHr
